name: Unbound Power
overview: Control is unstable. Objectives require greater presence to secure and score, testing the strength and focus of each warband.
primary_objectives: A Primary Objective is only considered controlled if a player has at least 3 Claim within 1". Each controlled Primary Objective is worth 2 Victory Points at the end of the round.
secondary_objectives: A Secondary Objective is only considered controlled if a player has at least 2 Claim within 1". Each controlled Secondary Objective is worth 1 Victory Point at the end of the round.
